FuncDef: This command configures the maximum amount of dynamic IPv4 ARP entries that can be learned on an IP interface.

ParaDef.Info: Enables the warning message to be sent at the specified threshold percentage, and also when the limit is exceeded. However, entries above the limit will be learned.
The threshold value (as a percentage) that triggers a warning message to be sent. Values-0 to 100.

The number of entries that can be learned on an IP interface expressed as a decimal integer. If the limit is set to 0, dynamic ARP learning is disabled and no dynamic ARP entries are learned. Values-0 to 524288.
